name: Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter
Lore: 'The most feared bounty hunter in the galaxy. Justifiably, his fee is as large as his reputation.',
Text: 'Text: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny if with your alien or Imperial (or adds two battle destiny if with your bounty hunter or Vader). Immune to attrition < 5. End of your turn: Use 2 Force to maintain OR Lose 2 Force to place in Used Pile OR Place out of play.',
